statements: SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scan_data;
SELECT scan_id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scan_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT timestamp FROM fingerprint_scan_data WHERE scan_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scan_data WHERE fingerprint_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT scan_id, COUNT(*) FROM fingerprint_scan_data GROUP BY scan_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scan_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT scan_id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scan_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, scan_id FROM fingerprint_scan_data WHERE scan_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY scan_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) AS day_of_week, COUNT(*) AS scans_count FROM fingerprint_scan_data GROUP BY day_of_week ORDER BY scans_count DESC;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(fingerprint_data)) AS avg_fingerprint_length, MAX(LENGTH(fingerprint_data)) AS max_fingerprint_length FROM fingerprint_scan_data;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id = 10;
SELECT fingerprint_data FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendance_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM attendance_logs GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT id, timestamp, fingerprint_data FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_id, log_time FROM attendance_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id > 10 AND timestamp <= NOW();
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(log_id) AS num_logs FROM attendance_logs GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_logs > 5 ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT employee_id, timestamp FROM attendance WHERE status = 'present' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fingerprint_scans
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department, timestamp FROM employees JOIN attendance ON employees.employee_id = attendance.employee_id WHERE status = 'PRESENT';
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(attendance_id) FROM attendance GROUP BY timestamp HAVING COUNT(attendance_id) > 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('Sales', 'Marketing') ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM attendance ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT name, department, position FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM departments
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY department, name
SELECT timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE id = 1001
SELECT name, department, position FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, position DESC, name
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS scan_count FROM fingerprint_scans GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.name, departments.dept_name FROM users JOIN departments ON users.user_id = departments.dept_id;
SELECT user_id, check_in, check_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM fingerprint_scans WHERE user_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM fingerprint_scans GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE check_in BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY check_in
SELECT users.name, departments.dept_name FROM users JOIN departments ON users.user_id = departments.dept_id
